title: Add instructor portrait asset and render it on the Biodata page

requirements.summary: Generate and add an optimized 512x512 square portrait image as a static asset for the Biodata page.
acceptanceCriteria: A new image file exists at frontend/public/assets/generated/biodata-portrait.dim_512x512.png.
The image is a square 512x512 portrait crop with the subject centered and minimal background distractions.
The image is visually suitable for use as a portrait (clean edges, not stretched, not pixelated).

file_operations.description: Create an optimized PNG derived from IMG-20220513-WA0015.jpg as a centered, square 512x512 portrait crop with reduced background distractions, suitable for use as a top-of-page instructor portrait.

requirements.summary: Update the existing Biodata page to display the new portrait near the top while keeping existing content unchanged and responsive.
acceptanceCriteria: The /biodata page renders the portrait image from /assets/generated/biodata-portrait.dim_512x512.png.
The image includes English alt text (e.g., "Instructor portrait").
The existing headings and body text currently shown on /biodata remain present and unchanged.
The layout is responsive (image and text look good on mobile and desktop) and uses existing Tailwind styling conventions in the file.

file_operations.description: Add a responsive portrait image block near the top of the page (close to the Biodata heading) that renders the static asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/biodata-portrait.dim_512x512.png with English alt text, while keeping the existing Biodata heading plus the Professional Summary and Core Competencies sections and their text unchanged; use Tailwind classes consistent with the fileâ€™s existing styling patterns.
